home.title: Civolution Solo Helper
home.play1: Play Civolution against Automa, the artificial opponent.
home.play2: This application replaces the Automa card deck and guides you through the game and Automa ruleset. It supports all difficult levels, the company special abilities and most of the executive officers. You can play against up to three Automa players.

action.abortGameConfirm: Aborting the running game - are you sure?
action.endGameConfirm: End this game and return to home screen - are you sure?

serviceWorkerUpdatedRefresh.title: Refresh Application
serviceWorkerUpdatedRefresh.notice: The application was updated - do you want to refresh to use the latest version?
